## 2) Type & Severity
- **Severity (choose one):**

  - **S1** = High (major impact, abuse/dupe, frequent crashes)
  - **S2** = Medium (annoying but playable, limited impact)
  - **S3** = Low (minor issue, cosmetic)

- **Category (check all that apply):**
  - [ ] Bug
  - [ ] Exploit / Duping
